name: Return (AidanMolina)
description:
This is a game created for my Game Art and Sound class. Controls and writing are simple as to have the focus be around the art and sound that were put into the game. The game only lasts for about 5-7 minutes, and is without a doubt my most complete gameplay experience to date. 

Hope you enjoy!

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • E: Interact with objects
  • Space: Go through dialogue
